name: AKKA Technologies
goal: AKKA Technologies is an engineering and technology consulting company with 21 centers of excellence across Europe, Africa, Middle-East, Asia and the Americas. As a European leader in the mobility segment with more than 15,000 skilled employees and an in-house research center, AKKA Research, it supports its clients with a wide-range of global services for industrial projects and the ability to collaborate across the entire product lifecycle.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Cooperative Intelligent Transport Systems
-Urban mobility
-Connected & automated driving
-Smart cities
-Clean energy
-Decarbonisation
-Digitalisation
